-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                 Release Notes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
DayZ is a multiplayer open world survival horror video game in development by 
Bohemia Interactive and the stand-alone version of the award-winning mod of the 
same name. The game was test-released on December 16, 2013, for Microsoft 
Windows via digital distribution platform Steam, and is currently in early alpha
 testing.

The game places the player in the fictional post-Soviet state of Chernarus, where 
an unknown virus has turned most of the population into violent zombies. As a 
survivor, the player must scavenge the world for food, water, weapons, and 
medicine, while killing or avoiding zombies, and killing, avoiding or co-opting 
other players in an effort to survive the zombie apocalypse.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                 Install Notes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Plateforme: PC
Langue: Multi/Anglais/Francais (jeu en francais, serveur en anglais)
Configuration logicielle supportÃ¢â‚¬Å¡e: Windows XP/Vista/7/8

				  Geforce 8800GT / Radeon HD 3830 /DirectX 9
				  RAM: 2Go / Windows Vista 32 bits / 10Go d'espace libre

Befor launching game for the first time, please change your nickname.
Edit file Lumaemu.ini, and change the playername value
        
Run Steam2WrapperLauncher.exe pour lancer

At the gamme lobby, click on  "change server" then "Remote". 
enter the adress and port of the server you want to join :
dayz.kortal.org port: 2402 
This server us the exe v0.28, but use the database of 0.37.115.791 (the moment you are
reading this)

If you experience bug, or need help, you can find every usefull information on 
our forum: <a href="
http://kortal.org/forum" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://kortal.org/forum</a>

You can also join the irc channel: #kortal @Quakenet

Have Fun !

ps: If you get error with X3Daudio1_6.dll, reinstall DirectX
